languages.text: "Я часто сталкиваюсь с коварной чернью. Праздность и ушлость сброда с нижних палуб порождают ересь, особенно во время варп-перелетов, и люди начинают вырезать на себе и молиться... всякому. Круг с восемью стрелами встречается чаще прочих символов, но такой вариации я не видела ни разу".

"I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."
languages.original_text: "Я часто сталкиваюсь с коварной чернью. Праздность и ушлость сброда с нижних палуб порождают ересь, особенно во время варп-перелетов, и люди начинают вырезать на себе и молиться... всякому. Круг с восемью стрелами встречается чаще прочих символов, но такой вариации я не видела ни разу".

The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

languages.text: "Ich habe oft mit boshaftem Abschaum zu tun. Der Müßiggang und die Gier auf den unteren Decks öffnet der Ketzerei Tür und Tor, vor allem bei Warpreisen, wenn die Leute anfangen, sich mit Symbolen zu schmücken und zu ... allerlei Dingen zu beten. Der Kreis mit acht Pfeilen ist am weitesten verbreitet, aber diese Variante habe ich noch nie gesehen."
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe oft mit boshaftem Abschaum zu tun. Der Müßiggang und die Gier auf den unteren Decks öffnet der Ketzerei Tür und Tor, vor allem bei Warpreisen, wenn die Leute anfangen, sich mit Symbolen zu schmücken und zu ... allerlei Dingen zu beten. Der Kreis mit acht Pfeilen ist am weitesten verbreitet, aber diese Variante habe ich noch nie gesehen."

languages.text: « J'ai souvent eu affaire à de la racaille insidieuse. L'oisiveté et l'avarice de la vermine des ponts inférieurs invitent à l'hérésie, d'autant plus pendant les voyages dans le Warp. Certains se gravent des signes à même la peau et se mettent à prier... toutes sortes de choses. Le cercle orné de huit flèches est le symbole le plus répandu, mais je n'avais encore jamais vu cette variante. »
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai souvent eu affaire à de la racaille insidieuse. L'oisiveté et l'avarice de la vermine des ponts inférieurs invitent à l'hérésie, d'autant plus pendant les voyages dans le Warp. Certains se gravent des signes à même la peau et se mettent à prier... toutes sortes de choses. Le cercle orné de huit flèches est le symbole le plus répandu, mais je n'avais encore jamais vu cette variante. »

languages.text: «Tengo que lidiar a menudo con tales blasfemias. El ocio y la avaricia de la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores son un caldo de cultivo para la herejía, sobre todo durante el tránsito por la disformidad, y mucha gente se graba esos signos en la piel y se dedica a rezar a... toda clase de cosas. El círculo con las ocho flechas es más habitual que otros símbolos, pero no había visto antes ese diseño».
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo que lidiar a menudo con tales blasfemias. El ocio y la avaricia de la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores son un caldo de cultivo para la herejía, sobre todo durante el tránsito por la disformidad, y mucha gente se graba esos signos en la piel y se dedica a rezar a... toda clase de cosas. El círculo con las ocho flechas es más habitual que otros símbolos, pero no había visto antes ese diseño».

languages.text: 「時に陰険な輩を相手にしなければならないことがあるのです。下層デッキのクズどもの怠惰と貪欲さが異端を生み出すのです。<歪み>の航行中は特に。連中は自分の体に印を刻んだり、祈りを捧げたりするのです…それも様々なものへと。8本の矢と丸のシンボルは他のものよりも一般的ですが、このパターンは初めて見ました」
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

traits.locale_text: 「時に陰険な輩を相手にしなければならないことがあるのです。下層デッキのクズどもの怠惰と貪欲さが異端を生み出すのです。<歪み>の航行中は特に。連中は自分の体に印を刻んだり、祈りを捧げたりするのです…それも様々なものへと。8本の矢と丸のシンボルは他のものよりも一般的ですが、このパターンは初めて見ました」

languages.text: “我经常要对付卑劣的乌合之众。底层甲板那些渣滓懒惰、贪婪的做派，往往是滋生异端邪说的温床。尤其是亚空间航行期间，那些人经常在自己身上画下各种各样的印记，对着……各种各样的东西祈祷。在那些符号之中，画着八个箭头的圆圈是最常见的。至于像这样的记号，我以前从来没见过。”
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."

traits.locale_text: “我经常要对付卑劣的乌合之众。底层甲板那些渣滓懒惰、贪婪的做派，往往是滋生异端邪说的温床。尤其是亚空间航行期间，那些人经常在自己身上画下各种各样的印记，对着……各种各样的东西祈祷。在那些符号之中，画着八个箭头的圆圈是最常见的。至于像这样的记号，我以前从来没见过。”

languages.text: "Sinsi ayaktakımıyla sık sık uğraşmam gerekir. Alt güvertelerdeki pisliklerin aylaklıkları ve tamahkârlıkları, özellikle de öteboyut yolculuğu esnasında kâfirliğe geçit verir. İnsanlar, kendi bedenlerine işaretler kazımaya ve... Her türden varlığa dua etmeye başlar. Sekiz oklu daire, diğer tüm sembollerden daha sık karşımıza çıkıyor. Ancak bu şeklini daha önce görmemiştim."
languages.original_text: "I often have to deal with insidious rabble. The idleness and avarice of the scum on the lower decks breeds heresy, especially during warp travel, and people start carving signs on themselves and praying to... all sorts of things. The circle with eight arrows is more common than any other symbol, but I've never seen this variation before."
